Package se.arkalix.core.plugin.or

Class OrchestrationStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.arkalix.core.plugin.or.OrchestrationStrategy
  • public class OrchestrationStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    Enumerates the different kind of strategies that can be used when querying an orchestration service for services to consume.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static OrchestrationStrategy DYNAMIC_ONLY
      Only request dynamic orchestration rules.
      static OrchestrationStrategy STORED_ONLY
      Only request predefined orchestration rules.
      static OrchestrationStrategy STORED_THEN_DYNAMIC
      First request predefined orchestration rules, then request dynamic orchestration rules if no suitable predefined rules were available.

    • Field Detail

      • STORED_ONLY

        public static final OrchestrationStrategy STORED_ONLY
        Only request predefined orchestration rules.

        This strategy is also referred to as store orchestration. When used, the orchestration service in question is consulted without telling it explicitly what services are wanted. The orchestration service is assumed to already know of certain predefined orchestration rules associated with the requesting system, which are returned if available.

      • STORED_THEN_DYNAMIC

        public static final OrchestrationStrategy STORED_THEN_DYNAMIC
        First request predefined orchestration rules, then request dynamic orchestration rules if no suitable predefined rules were available.

        In other words, if a rules-only request results in no entry matching whatever query caused the orchestration service to be contacted, a dynamic orchestration attempt is made afterwards.

      • DYNAMIC_ONLY

        public static final OrchestrationStrategy DYNAMIC_ONLY
        Only request dynamic orchestration rules.

        When used, the orchestration service in question is asked directly for explicitly specified services to consume.
